20101221180814.000|20101221180818.000|CC1|>> MY POINT WAS MY TOWN

20101221185621.000|20101221185621.000|CC1|          rest is here,         
20101221185621.000|20101221185624.000|CC1|    on the wings of Lunesta.    
20101221185624.000|20101221185624.000|CC1|  Lunesta helps you fall asleep 
20101221185624.000|20101221185627.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20101221185627.000|20101221185627.000|CC1|           so you can           
20101221185627.000|20101221185630.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20101221185630.000|20101221185630.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20101221185630.000|20101221185633.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20101221185633.000|20101221185635.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20101221185635.000|20101221185635.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20101221185635.000|20101221185638.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20101221185638.000|20101221185638.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20101221185638.000|20101221185640.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20101221185640.000|20101221185641.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20101221185641.000|20101221185641.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20101221185641.000|20101221185644.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20101221185644.000|20101221185646.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.  
20101221185646.000|20101221185646.000|CC1|     In depressed patients,     
20101221185646.000|20101221185648.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20101221185648.000|20101221185648.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20101221185648.000|20101221185650.000|CC1|           may occur.           
20101221185650.000|20101221185650.000|CC1|           Alcohol may          
20101221185650.000|20101221185652.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20101221185652.000|20101221185652.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20101221185652.000|20101221185654.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20101221185654.000|20101221185656.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20101221185656.000|20101221185656.000|CC1|    Side effects may include    
20101221185656.000|20101221185658.000|CC1|   unpleasant taste, headache,  
20101221185658.000|20101221185658.000|CC1|            dizziness           
20101221185658.000|20101221185700.000|CC1|     and morning drowsiness.    
20101221185700.000|20101221185700.000|CC1|   Ask your doctor if Lunesta   
20101221185700.000|20101221185703.000|CC1|        is right for you.
